de.mrapp.android.sidebar.view

Class SidebarView

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinearLayout
      • de.mrapp.android.sidebar.view.SidebarView

  • public class SidebarView
extends LinearLayout
    A custom view, which contains the sidebar view of a sidebar, as well as a view, which is used to visualize a shadow.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SidebarView(Context context, Inflater inflater, Location location, Drawable sidebarBackground, int shadowWidth, int shadowColor)
      Creates a new custom view, which contains the sidebar view of a sidebar, as well as a view, which is used to visualize a shadow.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location getLocation()
      Returns the location of the sidebar.
      int getShadowColor()
      Returns the color of the shadow.
      int getShadowWidth()
      Returns the width of the shadow in pixels.
      Drawable getSidebarBackground()
      Returns the background of the sidebar view.
      View getSidebarView()
      Returns the sidebar view.

      Sets the location of the sidebar.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SidebarView

        public SidebarView(Context context,
           Inflater inflater,
           Location location,
           Drawable sidebarBackground,
           int shadowWidth,
           int shadowColor)
        Creates a new custom view, which contains the sidebar view of a sidebar, as well as a view, which is used to visualize a shadow.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the view should belong to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        inflater - The inflater, which should be used to inflate the sidebar view, as an instance of the type Inflater. The inflater may not be null
        location - The location of the sidebar as a value of the enum Location. The location may either be LEFT or RIGHT
        sidebarBackground - The background of the sidebar view as an instance of the class Drawable or null, if the default background should be used
        shadowWidth - The width of the shadow in pixels as an Integer value. The width must be at least 0
        shadowColor - The color of the shadow as an Integer value

    • Method Detail

      • getShadowColor

        public final int getShadowColor()
        Returns the color of the shadow.
        Returns:
        The color of the shadow as an Integer value

      • setShadowColor

        public final void setShadowColor(int shadowColor)
        Sets the color of the shadow.
        Parameters:
        shadowColor - The color, which should be set, as an Integer value

      • getLocation

        public final Location getLocation()
        Returns the location of the sidebar.
        Returns:
        The location of the sidebar as a value of the enum Location. The location may either be LEFT or RIGHT

      • setLocation

        public final void setLocation(Location location)
        Sets the location of the sidebar.
        Parameters:
        location - The location, which should be set, as a value of the enum Location. The location may either be LEFT or RIGHT

      • getShadowWidth

        public final int getShadowWidth()
        Returns the width of the shadow in pixels.
        Returns:
        The width of the shadow in pixels as an Integer value

      • setShadowWidth

        public final void setShadowWidth(int shadowWidth)
        Sets the width of the shadow in pixels.
        Parameters:
        shadowWidth - The width, which should be set, as an Integer value. The width must be at least 0

      • getSidebarBackground

        public final Drawable getSidebarBackground()
        Returns the background of the sidebar view.
        Returns:
        The background of the sidebar view as an instance of the class Drawable or null, if the default background is used

      • setSidebarBackground

        public final void setSidebarBackground(Drawable background)
        Sets the background of the sidebar view.
        Parameters:
        background - The background, which should be set, as an instance of the class Drawable or null, if the default background should be used

      • getSidebarView

        public final View getSidebarView()
        Returns the sidebar view.
        Returns:
        The sidebar view as an instance of the class View. The sidebar view may not be null
